1/ The overall balance is computed using net financial transactions, and therefore, includes statistical discrepancy.

3/ Comprised of holding of T-bills and notes by non-bank financial institutions.

5/ The debt-to-GDP ratio is different when computed using the definition in the Government Debt Act of Suriname.
